ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package coleslaw mix with carrots

cookingTips: Toast ramen noodles in a dry skillet over medium heat until fragrant and lightly browned
Toast almonds and sunflower seeds separately to control their individual browning
Mix coleslaw with vinegar dressing just before serving to maintain maximum crunch
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This coleslaw depends entirely on careful timing and toasting technique. Help the cook understand why toasting the noodles and seeds matters and how to prevent them from burning. Why serve immediately?
